data.title: Handique Girls College, Guwahati: Courses, Contact Details, Facilities
data.meta_description: Get complete details on Handique Girls College, Guwahati courses, facilities, contact details, latest updates and campus details.
data.text:
Handique college, Guwahati was originally built in a small building positioned within the surroundings of Panbazar Girls’ High School and it was then known as ‘Gauhati Girls' College’. The current name of the college exhibits a humble attempt to honour the legacy of the Late Radha Kanta Handique by generations of its stakeholders with a deep knowledge of gratitude and respect.

Handique College Admissions is strictly done on the basis of merit. The merit list will be concluded by the admission committee and the decision of the admission committee is final. For admissions, students can apply on the official website of the college.

Handique college has good infrastructure for the students. Students can avail the facilities of the hostel, cafeteria, gym etc., The good infrastructure of the college will always ensure the performance of the students in academics. The good surroundings of the atmosphere will make the student feel a positive vibe, which will result in the confidence boost of the students.

Handique Girls College Highlights:

Handique college has been established with the motto of empowering women across the state through education. The vision of the college is to contribute towards the production of a tolerant, evenhanded, knowledgeable and compassionate society. The mission of the college is the enhancement of society through holistic education for women.

Type of University Public Approval NAAC and UGC Year of Establishment 1939 Facilities Hostel, Fitness Centre, Cafeteria & Computer Centre Handique Girls College Address Dighali Pukhuri West, Panbazar, Guwahati-781001 Handique Girls College Courses Offered UG and PG Handique Girls' College Fee Handique Girls College Contact Number 0361-2970214

Handique Girls College Courses:

Handique college offers courses in several disciplines for students, especially in the fields of Arts, Sciences and Computer Applications. Students need to check the official website of the college to apply for the corresponding course, which the student is interested in joining the course. The admissions were notified through local dailies and on the official website.

Discipline Course Specialization Arts UG BA PG MBA Science UG B.Sc PG M.Sc Computer Applications UG BCA PG PGDCA

Read More: Handique Girls College Courses and Fees

Handique Girls College Departments:

College has a vast number of departments to look after the students. Each department has dedicated to one separate subject to concentrate on that particular subject so that the quality of the education improves. The following are the departments which the college has to offer for students:

Assamese

Bengali

Botany

Chemistry

Computer Science

Economics

Education

English

History

Mathematics

Philosophy

Handique Girls College Facilities:

Handique college offers many facilities for its students to ensure academics are working perfectly fine. The green surroundings of the college will ensure the positive vibe of the college and can ensure the serenity of the college throughout the academic life for students. The below-mentioned are some of the facilities available for students that college offers:

Gym

Yoga

Cafeteria

Computer centre

NCC

NSS

Student Union

Hostel

Library

Read More: Handique Girls' College Infrastructure

Handique Girls College Fee Details:

Handique Girls' College offers a different fee structure for different courses. College offers courses in undergraduate and postgraduation. Following are the fee structures for a different course:

B.Sc Course fee is INR 7,650/- per annum.

The BA course fee is INR 7,460/- per annum.

Course fee for BCA is INR 26,950/- per annum.

The course fee for PGDCA is INR 18,000/- per annum.

Handique Girls College FAQs:

What are the courses that this college offers to students?

- The college mainly offers courses in Arts, Sciences and Computer Applications.

Does the college offer postgraduate courses to students?

- Yes, the college offers postgraduate courses as well.

Does it have a hostel facility?

- Yes, Handique Girls' College provides hostel facilities for students.

Handique Girls College Eligibility Criteria:

Handique Girls college offers courses in arts, sciences and computer application in undergraduate and in postgraduation. The eligibility criteria for the respective courses are given below:

Course Eligibility Criteria BA

Admission is purely based on the merit list of the qualifying examination.

Marks obtained in English and the best three other subjects are taken into consideration.

Students obtaining 45%(in general category) and 40% (reserved category) in the qualifying examination are qualified to apply for admission.

Students trying admission into any Honours subject must achieve 50%(general category) and 45% marks (reserved category) in the subjects concerned in the +2 examination.

B.Sc

Marks obtained in English and the three best science subjects are taken into consideration.

Securing 45%(in general category) and 40% (reserved category) in the qualifying examination are eligible to apply for admission.

BCA

Admissions are based on the merit list of the qualifying examination.

Should have passed +2 examination.

Students must face the interview personally at the time of admission.

MA

Students who have passed the degree in a particular course are eligible to apply for the course.

PGDCA

Students who have passed a three-year degree course in the respective course are eligible to apply for this course.

M.Sc

Students who have passed a three-year degree course are in the corresponding course are eligible to apply.

Handique Girls College Admissions:

Admissions to the college are notified to local dailies, the college notice board and the institute website. Students need to fill in and submit admission forms online by logging into the college website. The entrance processing fee of Rs. 300/- shall have to be paid through net banking/ATM-cum-debit card/UPI/Credit Card only. A common merit list of all applicants is prepared by the College for each course, and admissions are granted on the grounds of the merit list. All admissions are governed by the college admission rules. The decision of the Admission Committee regarding admissions is final.

Read More: Handique Girls' College Admission

Handique Girls College Hostel Details:

Handique College Facilities for students who are staying away from home are provided. It has been designated as Nirmal Prabha Bordoloi Girls’ Hostel, after the notable poetess, the late Nirmal Prabha Bordoloi, who was one of the renowned alumnae of the institution. The college hostel is one of the essential parts as well as an enlargement of the institution. The college understands how being away from home can influence the mental and physical well being of the students. Therefore, all our efforts are directed towards giving our students a home away from home and making their stay as comfortable as possible. The atmosphere of the hostel reflects the true multiplicity of the divergent cultures of the region and beyond as well. The hostel gives a number of conveniences for students such as:

Safe drinking water by Aqua guard.

Water vendors provide both warm and cold drinking water.

Refrigerators to keep food sterile.

Bain Marie to keep food fresh and warm.

Hygienically prepared vegetarian and non-vegetarian food.

Television in the common room cum dining hall.

Round the clock security.

Running water facility for students.

Generator for the unbroken electricity supply.

A medical facility with a well-furnished sick room.

The hostel admission fee is INR 16,000/- per annum.
